message: I was wondering if anyone at dramatica had considered porting the app to the iphone? I must confess that I am at my most creative when not in front of my computer.
I would amputate a body part for Dramatica on my iphone, even if it was only the Theme Browser. I'm not going to say which body part.
I did download the "Dramatica Table of Story Elements" color chart as a pdf and view it in ibooks.  So that helps.
Yes, we are interested in creating a Dramatica for the iPhone and iPad.  However, our first priority is to get Dramatica Pro 5 out the door.  THEN we'll address the iPhone and iPad.

@Chris_Huntley - any hint on when DP5 will be hitting the shelves?  I have upgraded one of my macs to OS X Lion and DP4 isn't compatible.  Have held off upgrading my laptop so I have at least a working version but would love to see DP5 soon.
